job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Title: Software Developer (Machine Learning)</p><p>Location: 100% Remote</p><p>Type: Contract</p><p>Duration: 6 Months</p><p>Experience: 5+ years</p><p><u>Duties</u>:</p><ul><li>Work alongside data science team to get output ready for engineering consumption (building APIs, optimizing performance, etc.)</li></ul><p><u>Requirements</u>:</p><ul><li>Experience working with .NET Core, .NET</li><li>R Programming language a plus</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>NRC is committed to providing our consultants with a better experience. </strong>We invest in relationships to better understand your career goals and aspirations. Through our Educate and Connect initiative, we offer multiple professional growth and thought leadership opportunities, including a comprehensive Consultant Education Reimbursement program of up to $2,000 annually for most roles, and actively connect you with our technical and charitable communities. Our efforts are acknowledged through our continued recognition as a <em>Best Places to Work</em>, <em>Top Workplaces</em>, and <em>Best and Brightest</em> award winner. is governed by our core values: Accountable, Passionate, Respectful, Innovative, and Collaborative. These fundamentals guide our business practices, our employment standards, and our continued willingness to give back. We encourage you to join the NRC family!</p>
